nodes.text: The mooka were a chimerical creature found in the galaxy.
The mooka species first appeared in Star Wars Legends in the 1992 book The Lost City of the Jedi, the second book in the Jedi Prince junior novel series by Paul Davids and Hollace Davids.

Their first canon reference was in the comic "Tales from Wild Space: The Best Pet", the secondary story of Star Wars Adventures 5, released in December 2017. Prior to that, the mooka appeared in the non-canon video game Disney Infinity 3.0 as an unlockable in the Twilight of the Republic Play Set.
